name: Auto Heat Drift
description:
DOWNLOAD AUTO HEAT DRIFT
RACE FOR FREE NOW!

Let's GO>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

You've are behind the wheel of a cop car chasing fleeing criminals! Make sure to catch them all. Multi guns are set up in your vehicle! Use them to crash and destroy your opponents!

Upgrade your car using coins that you collect along the way. Be precise in your driving and make sure you can handle incredible speeds.

Awesome features include:

• Fast, insane speeding shooting game
• Upgrade to different cars
• Real time environment
• Easy controls

Be sure you buckle up and get ready for an incredible ride!
